reviewText: Excellent for kids. Present a lot of facts in an entertaining way without sensationalizing or making sharks seem scary. My 4-year-old granddaughter loves it.

4 year old grandson loves sharks so this documentary was just what he liked, me too, maybe  little longer would've been even better we were just getting into it when it was about to end but still worth watching

Watch A LOT of shark documentaries. A fantastic overveiw of shark that demystifies the evil reputation. Very unique in its shark-freindly angle and incredible in its footage. A must have for the young shark enthusiast

Kudos to Capt JOn!

Want to see some amazing underwater, family friendly, up-close and personal cinematography? Than be sure to check out the latest in the Captain Jon series, "Sharks: Knights of the Sea"! You will not be disappointed!
